Welcome to Digitile Support
Thank you for choosing Digitile! If you require assistance or have any questions, our dedicated support team is here to help. Below you will find information on how to get in touch with us and our support hours.
Contact Information: Email: it@digitilez.com
Support Hours: Our support team is available from Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM (GMT+2).
How We Can Assist You: Our support team can assist you with:
Technical issues and troubleshooting
Account and subscription management
Feature requests and feedback
General inquiries about Digitile
How to Reach Us: Email: For non-urgent inquiries or if you prefer written communication, you can email us at it@digitilez.com.
We aim to respond to all emails within 24 hours during our support hours.
Thank you for choosing Digitile! We appreciate your business and look forward to assisting you.
